titles.title: Military Learning for Credit Act of 2018
A bill to authorize the use of veterans educational assistance for examinations to receive credit toward degrees awarded by institutions of higher learning, and for other purposes.
Military Learning for Credit Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Military Learning for Credit Act of 2018
This bill allows individuals entitled to veterans educational assistance to use it to cover the costs of taking examinations to receive credit toward degrees awarded by institutions of higher learning for approved education programs.
